definitions.definition: The left-wing political philosophy named after and based on the ideas of Leon Trotsky that is characterized by international socialism , opposition to Stalinism , the theory of permanent revolution and the theory of the vanguard party .

main_definition: The left-wing political philosophy named after and based on the ideas of Leon Trotsky that is characterized by international socialism , opposition to Stalinism , the theory of permanent revolution and the theory of the vanguard party .
